Personally I had a few 'issues' with housekeeping (missing soap or shampoo, not changing sheets) but nothing big. It has a pool, a rooftop bar, a nice bar at the lobby and another restaurant. Summary: This is a review that is being written during the Covid pandemic so things at this hotel could improve once we are out of the thick of this pandemic. Hotel close to a number of other restaurants so lots of dining options in the area and if you're heading to Disneyland you can cut through the mall on the back and be there pretty quickly.  Access to freeway pretty easy too so a tick from me.

Thank you Megan!! Will definitely be come back soon for another weekend get away.
